title: I recieved 4 Key Fragments... is this supposed to happed?
body:
I left my computer on overnight yesterday, and 11 hours later I receive 4? Not even 2 notifs in a row, just 1 saying I received 4.

On a side note, that night was the same night I won 2 ranked games in a row with SKT T1 Jhin and got promoted to Bronze 2

replies.body:
It seems that the notification for fragments can get delayed sometimes.  Most commonly you might see this when you relog, with a bunch showing up at once.  

Regarding your ranked games, I'm not sure about the issue.  Can you elaborate?
Oh I just thought getting promoted and/or being on a hot streak would grant extra key shards
